Title: Living Legends
Writer: Sanya Borisova, Niki Iliev, Nikolay Vasilevsky
Actors: Orlin Pavlov, Niki Iliev, Sanya Borisova, Dimo Alexiev
Plot: Group of friends meet again, 13 years after their prom because of a problem of one of them, and face the opportunity to experience the things in life they have always put aside in life so far.
